projects.title: Women Empowerment Website
projects.description: At Avancod, we created Echoes Of Empowerment, a platform dedicated to championing women's journeys. Our mission is to provide a lifetime of support, resources, and opportunities that empower women to overcome challenges and reach their highest potential.

projects.title: Misty Mounts Travel Website
projects.description: At Avancod, we created Misty Mounts to help travelers discover hidden gems in Northern Pakistan. It offers seamless spot management with hotel and transport options. A disaster predictor ensures safety by aiding informed travel decisions.
